channel.title: Comments on: Mawa Cake and Bolinhas De Coco – Daring Bakers Challenge August 2013

item.title: By: Sinnesfreuden
item.dc:creator: Sinnesfreuden
item.description: Great job! Both the cake and the cookies look wonderul. I admire all those orchids in the background. They are so beautiful.
item.content:encoded:
Great job! Both the cake and the cookies look wonderul.
I admire all those orchids in the background. They are so beautiful.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: I was fortunate enough to have a couple of slices of this beautifully flavoured cake. It is a shame it takes so long to make the mawa component of this cake. Well done Anita, keep them coming!!!!
item.content:encoded: I was fortunate enough to have a couple of slices of this beautifully flavoured cake. It is a shame it takes so long to make the mawa component of this cake. Well done Anita, keep them coming!!!!
